Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Balasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the hips, thighs, and ankles while calming the mind.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Bitilasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A gentle pose that stretches the spine and neck, often paired with Cat Pose (Marjaryasana).

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Marjaryasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A gentle pose that stretches the spine and neck, often paired with Cow Pose (Bitilasana).

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Padmasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A seated meditation pose that promotes calmness and flexibility in the hips and knees.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Baddha Konasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A seated pose where the soles of the feet are pressed together, stretching the inner thighs and groin.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Sivasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A relaxation pose that allows the body and mind to rest and integrate the benefits of the practice.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Utkatasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the shoulders and chest.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Vrksasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core while improving focus and concentration.

Beginner-Friendly Poses.name: Trikonasana
Beginner-Friendly Poses.description: A standing pose that stretches the hamstrings, hips, and side body while improving balance.

Good for Flexibility.name: Hanumanasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A deep split that stretches the hamstrings and hip flexors while improving flexibility.

Good for Flexibility.name: Upavistha Konasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A seated forward fold that stretches the inner thighs and hamstrings while calming the mind.

Good for Flexibility.name: Uttanasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A forward fold that stretches the hamstrings and spine while calming the mind.

Good for Flexibility.name: Parsvottanasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A forward fold that stretches the hamstrings and spine while improving balance.

Good for Flexibility.name: Paschimottanasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A seated forward fold that stretches the spine and hamstrings while calming the mind.

Good for Flexibility.name: Urdhva Dhanurasana
Good for Flexibility.description: An advanced backbend that strengthens the arms, legs, and spine while opening the chest and shoulders.

Good for Flexibility.name: Halasana
Good for Flexibility.description: An inversion that stretches the spine and hamstrings while calming the mind.

Good for Flexibility.name: Eka Pada Rajakapotasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A deep hip opener that stretches the hip flexors, thighs, and groin while opening the chest.

Good for Flexibility.name: Ardha Chandrasana
Good for Flexibility.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the hamstrings and side body.

Good for Flexibility.name: Ardha Matsyendrasana
Good for Flexibility.english_name: Half Lord of the Fishes Pose
Good for Flexibility.description: A seated spinal twist that improves spinal mobility and digestion.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Dhanurasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A backbend that stretches the entire front body while strengthening the back muscles.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Urdhva Mukha Svsnssana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A backbend that strengthens the spine and arms while opening the chest and shoulders.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Salamba Bhujangasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A gentle backbend that strengthens the spine while opening the chest and shoulders.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Setu Bandha Sarvangasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A backbend that strengthens the legs and spine while opening the chest and shoulders.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Ardha Matsyendrasana
Good for Spine & Back.english_name: Half Lord of the Fishes Pose
Good for Spine & Back.description: A seated spinal twist that improves spinal mobility and digestion.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Ustrasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A deep backbend that stretches the front body while opening the chest and shoulders.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Camatkarasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: An energizing backbend that opens the chest and shoulders while stretching the front body.

Good for Spine & Back.name: Bitilasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A gentle pose that stretches the spine and neck, often paired with Cat Pose (Marjaryasana).

Good for Spine & Back.name: Marjaryasana
Good for Spine & Back.description: A gentle pose that stretches the spine and neck, often paired with Cow Pose (Bitilasana).

Great for Core Strength.name: Navasana
Great for Core Strength.description: A core-strengthening pose where the body balances on the sit bones in a 'V' shape.

Great for Core Strength.name: Ardha Navasana
Great for Core Strength.description: A core-strengthening pose where the body balances on the sit bones in a 'V' shape.

Great for Core Strength.name: Phalakasana
Great for Core Strength.description: A core-strengthening pose that builds endurance in the arms, shoulders, and core.

Great for Core Strength.name: Vasisthasana
Great for Core Strength.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the arms, core, and legs while improving focus.

Great for Core Strength.name: Utkatasana
Great for Core Strength.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the shoulders and chest.

Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.name: Utkatasana
Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the shoulders and chest.

Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.name: Trikonasana
Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.description: A standing pose that stretches the hamstrings, hips, and side body while improving balance.

Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.name: Utthita Parsvakonasana
Knee-Friendly / Strengthen Knees.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the side body.

Good for Balance & Focus.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core while improving focus and concentration.

Good for Balance & Focus.name: Ardha Chandrasana
Good for Balance & Focus.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the hamstrings and side body.

Good for Balance & Focus.description: A balancing pose that stretches the hamstrings while improving focus and concentration.

Good for Balance & Focus.name: Vasisthasana
Good for Balance & Focus.description: A balancing pose that strengthens the arms, core, and legs while improving focus.

Good for Balance & Focus.name: Bakasana
Good for Balance & Focus.description: An arm balance that strengthens the arms, wrists, and core while improving balance and focus.

Good for Balance & Focus.name: Pincha Mayurasana

Relaxation & Cooling Down.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the hips, thighs, and ankles while calming the mind.

Relaxation & Cooling Down.name: Sivasana
Relaxation & Cooling Down.description: A relaxation pose that allows the body and mind to rest and integrate the benefits of the practice.
